note.p: Burial: In the chapel of the Charterhouse, London
Education: Charterhouse School, London; Clare College, Cambridge; BA (1694), MA (1697

Career: Usher, then Master (1728-1732) at Charterhouse (1695); ordained deacon (1698); Professor of Geometry at Gresham College, London (1704-1729); the Royal Society met in his rooms there (1704-1710)
Sources: Bulloch's Roll; DNB; Thomas; Venn
References: Sir Alan Cook, 'Halley the Londoner' in NR 1993 vol 47 pp 163-177
Obituaries in 'Gentleman's Magazine' 1732, p586; 'Historical Register Chronological Diary' 1732, p6
